data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Akhmat Grozny to take a throw-in in Khimki territory.
In the minute 2, Odise Roshi for Akhmat Grozny gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Pavel Kukuyan awards Khimki a goal kick.
Throw-in for Khimki in their own half.
In the minute 3, Free kick for Khimki in their own half.
Ismael Silva (Akhmat Grozny) has received a yellow card from Pavel Kukuyan.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny in the half of Khimki.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
Corner awarded to Khimki.
In the minute 7, Dmitri Tikhiy's header is off-target for Khimki.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Khimki.
Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 8, Khimki's Mohamed Konate is whistled for offside at Arena Khimki.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a Akhmat Grozny throw-in in Khimki's half.
Khimki have a goal kick.
In the minute 11, Free kick for Khimki in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Akhmat Grozny's Andres Ponce has run offside.
In the minute 12, Pavel Kukuyan awards the away team a throw-in.
Khimki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Khimki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 15, Akhmat Grozny's Ismael Silva gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Khimki at Arena Khimki.
Akhmat Grozny are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 16, Kirill Bozhenov is booked for the home team.
Akhmat Grozny have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
Akhmat Grozny have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 18, Vladimir Iljin (Akhmat Grozny) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Akhmat Grozny push forward at Arena Khimki and Miroslav Bogosavac gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Khimki defence.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
In the minute 20, Corner awarded to Khimki.
Khimki have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
Corner awarded to Khimki.
In the minute 21, Egor Danilkin scores with a header and the home team now lead 1-0.
Artem Polyarus with an assist there.
Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
In the minute 23, Ball goes out of play for a Khimki goal kick.
Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Khimki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Akhmat Grozny's half?
In the minute 25, Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Evgeny Kharin for Akhmat Grozny who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Evgeny Kharin is back on the pitch.
In the minute 27, Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny just outside Khimki's area.
Akhmat Grozny have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
Free kick for Khimki in their own half.
In the minute 29, Akhmat Grozny to take a throw-in in Khimki territory.
Throw-in Khimki.
In Khimki Khimki drive forward through Kirill Bozhenov. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 32, Akhmat Grozny's Odise Roshi gets in a shot on goal at Arena Khimki. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Akhmat Grozny have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 35, Can Akhmat Grozny capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Khimki's half?
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
In the minute 36, Akhmat Grozny awarded a free kick in their own half.
Andres Ponce for Akhmat Grozny has been booked by Pavel Kukuyan and receives a first yellow card.
Akhmat Grozny's Evgeny Kharin attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Pavel Kukuyan awards Khimki a goal kick.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Khimki in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
Artem Polyarus (Khimki) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 41, Khimki are whistled for offside.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
In Khimki a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 43, Akhmat Grozny have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
Akhmat Grozny surge into the attack at Arena Khimki but Andres Ponceâ€™s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Khimki at Arena Khimki.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny in the half of Khimki.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Khimki.
Pavel Kukuyan will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Khimki needs to be cautious. Akhmat Grozny have an attacking throw-in.
Can Akhmat Grozny get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Khimki's half?
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
Oleg Ivanov is replacing Andres Ponce for the away team.
Akhmat Grozny make their second substitution with Bernard Berisha replacing Evgeny Kharin.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny.
Ismael Silva for Akhmat Grozny drives towards goal at Arena Khimki. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Khimki at Arena Khimki.
Akhmat Grozny drive upfield and Artem Timofeev gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Khimki defender.
Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny close to the penalty box.
In the minute 50, Pavel Kukuyan signals a throw-in for Akhmat Grozny, close to Khimki's area.
Pavel Kukuyan awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Khimki in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 51, Khimki have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Khimki goal kick.
In the minute 53, Pavel Kukuyan signals a Khimki throw-in in Akhmat Grozny's half.
Throw-in high up the field for Khimki in Khimki.
Important block from the Akhmat Grozny defence as Aleksandr Troshechkin fires in a strike for Khimki.
In the minute 55, Ball safe as Akhmat Grozny is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Khimki's Mohamed Konate misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 55, Pavel Kukuyan awards Akhmat Grozny a goal kick.
The away team replace Odise Roshi with Maksim Maksimovich Nenahov.
Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
In the minute 57, Khimki's Artem Polyarus is on target but unsuccessful.
Akhmat Grozny attack but Marat Bystrov's header doesn't find the target.
Khimki have a goal kick.
In the minute 59, Artem Polyarus of Khimki smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Khimki have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
Mohamed Konate (Khimki) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 60, Goal kick for Akhmat Grozny at Arena Khimki.
Oleg Ivanov gets his shot on target but fails to score for Akhmat Grozny.
The match at Arena Khimki has been interrupted briefly for a check on Ismael Silva, who is down injured.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
In Khimki, Arshak Koryan of Khimki is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In Khimki, Artem Polyarus (Khimki) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 63, It's a goal kick for the away team in Khimki.
Ismael Silva returns to the field for Akhmat Grozny after picking up a slight injury.
Khimki have been awarded a penalty...
In the minute 64, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Khimki.
It seems as if Ismael Silva is unable to continue. Georgi Melkadze replaces him for the away team.
In the minute 66, Khimki are pushing forward but Artem Polyarus's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Akhmat Grozny goal kick.
Artem Polyarus (Khimki) had a chance from the penalty spot but missed!
In the minute 69, Pavel Kukuyan signals a throw-in for Akhmat Grozny, close to Khimki's area.
In Khimki Khimki drive forward through Artem Polyarus. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Pavel Kukuyan awards Khimki a goal kick.
In the minute 70, Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Akhmat Grozny have been given a penalty...
Throw-in high up the field for Akhmat Grozny in Khimki.
In the minute 72, At Arena Khimki, Brian Idowu has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Goal! Vladimir Iljin makes it 1-1. The equalizer came in the form of a penalty.
Kamran Aliev is on a sub for Arshak Koryan for Khimki.
In the minute 74, Artem Timofeev puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 1-2.
That's a fine assist from Bernard Berisha.
In the minute 75, In Khimki a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Bernard Berisha (Akhmat Grozny) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny.
Dmitri Gunko is making the team's second substitution at Arena Khimki with Danil Lipovoy replacing Mohamed Konate.
In the minute 76, Brian Idowu (Khimki) has been booked for the second time by the referee and is off!
Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
Akhmat Grozny are coming forward and Marat Bystrov gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 79, Goal kick for Khimki at Arena Khimki.
Throw-in for Khimki in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 80, Free kick Khimki.
Andrey Semenov (Akhmat Grozny) gets a yellow card.
Khimki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
In the minute 83, Akhmat Grozny drives forward and Georgi Melkadze gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a Akhmat Grozny throw-in in Khimki's half.
In the minute 86, Andrey Talalaev (Akhmat Grozny) is making a fifth substitution, with Abubakar Kadyrov replacing Vladimir Iljin.
Akhmat Grozny's Oleg Ivanov gets in a shot on goal at Arena Khimki. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Akhmat Grozny have a goal kick.
In the minute 88, Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in the half of Khimki.
Aleksandr Troshechkin (Khimki) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 89, Artem Timofeev is back on his feet again.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Artem Timofeev.
Free kick for Khimki in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Akhmat Grozny have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
Can Akhmat Grozny capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In Khimki a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Bernard Berisha gets his shot on target but fails to score for Akhmat Grozny.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-2.
Abubakar Kadyrov (Akhmat Grozny) gets a yellow card.
Red card in Khimki! Kirill Bozhenov has been shown a second yellow card by Pavel Kukuyan.
